website_summaries.verdict: Barron's is a popular name for producing study guides, and this latest police officer version is no exception. It's also one of the most updated sources available.
pros: A popular prep book for potential police officers written by 2 professionals in the field
Includes information relevant to numerous police departments, practice tests, study strategies, and detailed information
cons: Other than the occasional report of a damaged book on arrival, few readers complain about the usefulness of this book

customer_reviews.title: Thin Blue Line
customer_reviews.text: Passed my police exam for Dallas PD. Every police department is different so keep this in mind because they all use different standards for testing. This book covers every possible test you may encounter.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Try Norman Halls Police Prep Book
customer_reviews.text: This book is great don’t get me wrong but the Notmal Hall Police book is great it’s right to the point. Broken down by what is exactly on most department tests. That’s my personal preference but to each is their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This book i think was great help. My only complaint is that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This book i think was great help. My only complaint is that it is very focussed around the NY City test, and my test, although was in NY, was not a city test, and was nothing at all like the book practice tests of content. However, if you read all the strategies provided, and practice the test and the wording, you should be prepared for anything they are asking. The test is less about what you know, and more about how well you can understand what they are asking and extrapolating the correct answers from information provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy reading
customer_reviews.text: Great book! A lot of obvious information that I personally didn't think of so it's good for them to point them out! Definitely enjoying this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Fermin Grande

customer_reviews.title: Helpful practice questions
customer_reviews.text: Great material. I passed the written test at 2 departments. The questions in this book are difficult, they will help to prepare you for any test. This book also offers Oral Interview tips and practice exams. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Study Book for NJ Lee exam 2019
customer_reviews.text: Use this book to study for the New Jersey Lee exam. I can honestly After studying this book, the test was easy. More than half of the practice questions, was on the exam! The tips on how to break down the questions also helped a lot with the actual exam.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: No math section
customer_reviews.text: If math is a weakness look for something else. As a exam guide they should include ALL sections
customer_reviews.author: Hamsta

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful! Helped me pass my test with a 90. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't help me at all. I went through the whole book and failed twice.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I ordered for my grandson to take a test for ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my grandson to take a test for the DNR academy. I rated it 5 stars because he said it helped a lot. Cookie
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Oates

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: It helped me pass the police test, I got a 98 but still can't get hired. I don't blame the book I blame my genger??
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brent

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: Great brand, I've learned swiftly compared to other book brands. Its detailed and clear.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Helped me get a 96 on the NYS trooper exam.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: A very good guide
customer_reviews.text: You can find as details as you want. I find it useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kaniz/ megh

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it I used barrons to study for the asvab as well was the best study guide
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Foster

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Good quality! I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vaichus

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This book is a must for preparing for law enforcement testing. I tested for my local PD that does not use National Testing Services “which is a joke test” this test was 3 hrs long and extremely difficult. I passed with the highest score out of 6 others, which got me a job offer.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: very great study guide
customer_reviews.text: very great study guide. pASSED MY FIRST POLICE TEST WITH THIS GUIDE AND I HAVE MANY MORE TO COME! RECOMMENDED FOR PEOPLE WHO SERIOUSLY WANT TO GET INTO THE POLICE DEPARTMENT! EXTREMELY HELPFULA ND HELPS U DO BETTER ON TEST! BEST STUDY GUIDE OUT THERE!
customer_reviews.author: edmond liu

customer_reviews.title: Great Secenarios and Practice Tests.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second version I buy. I can’t say it was the reason I’ve passed so many law enforcement exams as I’m a genius but it definitely helped. All jokes aside this is a great book, especially as a refresher for tests I’ve taken later on in my career. I aced many law enforcement exams and I genuinely think that this book gave me some insight and confidence to thankfully do well enough to where I had the option on what agency I would join. I bought a second copy for a friend who’s trying to get in the force and he’s feeling confident about the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Brazuka

customer_reviews.title: Terrific study guide, poor packing.
customer_reviews.text: The book is great for the prep work my daughter needs to do. However, the book arrived damaged. The cover is creased and the first 213 pages are folded over.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Messineo

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide.
customer_reviews.text: Detailed and covers the material well. Highly recommended if you need to study. Police tests are not for winging it. Better to walk in prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This book will definitely get you ready!
customer_reviews.text: This book will absolutely get you ready for the police test! If you manage to read it all, and finish all the tests getting all correctly, you will totally pass. The tests are exactly like this and the book does a fantastic job at pointing you to the right way of becoming a police officer.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Bello

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR MIDDLE AND HIGHSCHOOL!! As United Nations Military Lady and TEACHER I SPIT ON USA SYSTEM!!
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FOR MIDDLE AND HIGH SCHOOLERS!! AS UNITED NATIONS MILITARY LADY AND TEACHER I SPIT ON USA SYSTEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Book
customer_reviews.text: I really do not recommend this book. It contradicts itself. In the whole book it states to not choose your answers based on your knowledge but for what the book states; but as the book goes and you check your answers, you’ll have most of your answers wrong because the answers are not based on the reading but on your outside knowledge. Do not buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diego
